release.action: Safeguard against null plugin configuration (previously NPE)
Consistently use camel case for system's properties used in configuration
zinc: changed from colon to platform-specific path separator
Zinc integration for incremental compilation of Scala and Java sources.
remove temporary scala-maven-RANDOM.args after run if displayCmd != true
Use Maven 3.0 toolchain API to configure a specific JDK to build with
The compilerPlugin element now honors the classifier of the given artifact.
use a .timestamp file per outputDir + sourceDirs
sourceDir is no longer added to project source's roots for compilation during 'compile' goal (but it is used to by the scala plugin), use 'add-source' goal to modify project source's roots
added docjar task to create scaladoc *and* place it in a jar file attached to the project.
modify VersionNumber class so scala-virtualized builds can be used.
scala:console use jline from scala-lang when scala's verion >= 2.9.0
provide a configuration "useCanonicalPath" to use CanonicalPath (or not)
add @threadSafe on goals : compile, testCompile, run, script
every lines of an scalac' error or warnings (including guilty source code) should be log with [ERROR] or [WARNING], not only the first one
scala:doc no longer remove elements from the classpath
move from org.scala-tools to net.alchim31.maven (repo hosted by oss.sonatype)
rename artifactId from maven-scala-plugin to scala-maven-plugin (follow maven rules and warning)
change name of github repository from maven-scala-plugin to scala-maven-plugin
change license from ASL 2.0 to public domain (Unlicense)
remove goals cs-*
Pass-through System.err and System.in to scala
add command line property 'addScalacArgs' to pass scalac arguments (for test/tuning of scalac)
scalac -classpath includes goals's output dir instead of project's output dir
archive generated by scala:genjson into $HOME/.config/vscaladoc2/apis can be intalled/deployed like regular artifact
Fixed bug with cctest that caused the tests to not run if there are no main source files but there are test source files
Add ccTestGoals parameters to choose others test goals (eg: scalatest:test)
scala:genjson can support custom json configuration
scala:genjson upgrade default version of vscaladoc2_genjson to 0.3
Add scala:genjson to generate scaladoc in json format (via vscaladoc2_genjson)
scala:cc and scala:cctest raise an "UnsupportedOperationException: USELESS"
New scala:cctest goal for Continuous Testing of Scala projects
scala:cc now works OK if verbose is enabled
scala:doc now works with maven 3.0 (and maven-site-plugin 3.0-beta-2)
fix issue in finding the compiler for scala's version with modifier prefixed by '.' instead of '-' like 2.8.1.RC2
aggregate vscaladoc should not run with scaladoc(2)

release.description: scalac integration and other minor updates
release.action: Allow scala:doc to generate scaladoc for multi-level projects like lift (quick fix)
first raw integration with tycho
script no longer include default import (like for Conversion, as it will not be part of scala 2.8)
change the classpath rules for running and compiling script (see doc)
property 'maven.scala.displayCmd' replaced by 'displayCmd' shorter for command line typing
property 'maven.scala.version' replaced by 'scala.version' to avoid over-configuration
scaladoc goal now executes generate-sources before executing
Documentation for scalac arguments updated in usage_compiler.html
Dependent Artifacts are now listed when there are scala version mismtaches detected
Scalac plugins now sent to REPL when executing scala:console
the list of source to compile is sorted by path to allow better "reproductible" build across box (as scalac seems sensible to file order)
add redirection of spawned process to (java.io.tmpdir)/(mainClassName).(err|out)
integration with ScalaCS
compile, test-compile, cc compile all files by default
compile, test-compile, cc log the root directories of compilation of the list of files that will be compiled (to allow editor/IDE to reset markers/annotation)
output line from compiler are redirected to maven's logger in forked mode => prefixed by [ERROR]/[WARN]/[INFO] + ease integration with m2eclipse (FULL_BUILD)
prepare integration of scala-tool-server (sts) with the goal sts-init
fix documentation of default value for goal's configuration (http://github.com/davidB/maven-scala-plugin/issues/unreads#issue/16)
fix regression of 2.12 where scala:cc stop/exit at first error
rename packages to use a "flat one level" : org.scala_tools.maven.xxx => org_scala_tools_maven_xxx (ease file / web browsing)
remove yaml as pom (maven-yamlpom-plugin doesn't support !true as properties value)
fix "Broken Pipe" issue on Windows
use Yaml to manage pom (thanks to maven-yamlpom-plugin http://wiki.github.com/mrdon/maven-yamlpom-plugin)
compile and doc mojo now use includes and excludes configuration.
fixed documentation errors from 2.11. Added start of FAQ section
compilerPlugin configuration now pulls in transitive dependencies.
Ensure doc is written to site/scaladoc directory with both scala:doc and site goals
mvn scala:console now works from windows
Once again mvn scala:console does *not* compile the project. See the FAQ
the plugin work with snapshot version of scala-library and scala-compiler
now failOnMultipleScalaVersions == true stop the build
fix vscaladoc aggregation to work with maven 2.1.0
replace shitty by maven-invoker-plugin to run integration-test (shitty doesn't work with maven 2.1.0)
add jline in the classpath of scala:console to enable REPL enhancement when jline is available
For scala version prior to 2.8.0, maven-scala-plugin could use a file to pass arguments to Main. This fixes issues on OSes with argument length limitations (like windows)
For scala version 2.8.0 and above, maven-scala-plugin now uses the @ argument to pass arguments via a file. This fixes issues on OSes with argument length limitations (like windows)
allow running vscaladoc aggregation only from command line use "-Dforce-aggregate=true" (avoid using in pom.xml)
disable use of ConsolePiper that generate an echo of command when running scala:console
No longer using Josh's dumb algorithm when checking for multiple scala versions.
doc goal now behaves like compiler when looking for scala version.
test source directory parameter (testSourceDir) is now added to the testSourceDirectories (instead of compile source directories).
Added support for executing scalac plugins.
Added support for optional forking of scalac.
Added support to turn off sending Java source to scalac.
Plugin now detects multiple versions of scala library and issues a warning/fails.
Added documentation for Java/Scala combined projects. Updated integration tests to ensure it works appropriately.
wrong split of -DaddArgs when running 'mvn scala:run -DmainClass=scala.tools.nsc.Main -DaddArgs="scriptName"'
Console goal now executes project compile beforehand
does *not* send all java files to the scala compiler for versions prior to 2.7.2
added support to look in all registered source directories for scala files
now send all java files to the scala compiler
fixed minor issues in documentation xml
added support for automatic integration tests
redefine the run goal at the test-compile phase, to have a correct classpath
add ability to run scala script (from pom.xml or external file)
detection of the scala version use the test scope when compiling test classes
rename 'scalaJars' configuration attribute to 'dependencies'
no more add scala-dbc and scala-decoder to the classpath when running scaladoc, compiler (to be compatible with 2.7.2)
auto-detect the scala-compiler version from the scala-library version declared as dependency
add an alternate format for compiler output if maven is called with "-DemacsMode=true"
add launchers : predefined configuration for scala:run
change the source host from code.google.com to github
add a shortcut config to use vscaladoc : vscaladocVersion, it's an alias of using the previous scaladocClassName and scalaJars
update the doc goal to support scala 2.7.1 (change the way to call scaladoc)
fix a bug in custom scaladoc and call to "mvn site"
add the option "once" to scala:cc, if once == true then it is not a continuous compilation but run once = compile only (no check on resources,...)
add the configuration parameter scaladocClassName to allow custom scaladoc Main
add continuous compilation : compilation run in loop and compile only modified file (non-stop)
add configuration scalaJars for additional jar in the classpath of scalaMainClass (improve support of custom main/compiler)
compile and testCompile, only compile newer source file modification than the last compilation
add basic support of javarebel into the console goal
the console goal (with history and line navigation)
linksource option of scaladoc, default is now true
call "scalac -help -X -Y" for scala:help
location/directory of scaladocs for modules
scaladoc bottom substitution
location/directory of scaladocs
add license to header of source file
change groupId to org.scala-tools
add reports to the genereted site
generate scaladoc like javadoc (as a report)
add support for scaladoc's options (footer, windowtitle,...)
the help goal to display compiler arguments
allow to display the command line used
allow to choose the version of scala compiler
use 'args' and 'jvmArgs' to provide complementary options to scala
remove configuration entry : memorymax, memorymin, deprected...
support for source code not under src/main/scala
compile test, with the test dependencies
execute the "run" goal with the runtime dependencies
declare scala-compiler as a plugin dependencies, so it is no more needed to declare scala-compiler as a project's dependencies
goals are documented via the standard maven-plugin-report
